text:
@IlhanMN Can I go get my hair cut now? Or, are we still using #COVID19 to divide voters & undermine political opponents?

It's #tiresome and we #SeeThroughYou. We also know that the #MSM should be #investigated & held liable for decimating the retirement savings of many elderly people.
